duck: L'Encobert - The Hidden was a mysterious and charismatic leader of the remnants of the rebels in the last stages of the Revolt of the Brotherhoods in Aragon.
Hidden (album), a 2010 album by British group These New Puritans
Hidden (Coma Virus album), a 1996 album by Coma Virus
hidden definition: being out of sight or not readily apparent.
"The Hidden" (The Penguins of Madagascar episode), an episode of The Penguins of Madagascar
The Hidden (game developer), a defunct British game developer
The Hidden (novel), a 2006 suspense novel by Kathy Mackel
The Hidden (Animorphs), the thirty-ninth book in the Animorphs series by K.A. Applegate.
The Hidden (video game), a modification to the computer game Half Life 2

wiki.text:
</nowiki>, see }} 'Hidden' or 'The Hidden' can refer to:
* L'Encobert (in Catalan; El Encubierto in Spanish; "The Hidden [One]"), a
  mysterious rebel leader in the Revolt of the Brotherhoods in Valencia in 1522
* Hidden, also known as [[Caché (film)|Caché]], a 2005 French drama film
* ''Hidden'' (2009 film), a 2009 Norwegian horror film
* ''Hidden'' (Coma Virus album), a 1996 album by Coma Virus
* ''Hidden'' (album), a 2010 album by British group These New Puritans
* ''Hidden'' (''Torchwood''), a Torchwood spin-off audiobook
* ''Hidden'' (TV series), a 2011 BBC television drama
* ''The Hidden'' (film), a 1987 science fiction/horror film
* ''The Hidden'' (novel), a 2006 suspense novel by Kathy Mackel
* The Hidden (game developer), a defunct British game developer
* ''The Hidden'' (video game), a modification to the computer game Half Life 2
* ''The Hidden'' (''Animorphs''), the thirty-ninth book in the Animorphs series
  by K.A. Applegate.
* "The Hidden" (The Penguins of Madagascar episode), an episode of The Penguins
  of Madagascar
wiki.title: hidden
